00044 #define STALLEP0() EP0CS |= bmEPSTALL
00045 
00050 #define RESETTOGGLE(ep) TOGCTL = (ep&0x0F) + ((ep&0x80)>>3); TOGCTL |= bmRESETTOGGLE
00051 
00052 
00057 #define RESETFIFO(ep) {FIFORESET=0x80; SYNCDELAY();\
00058                        FIFORESET=ep; SYNCDELAY();\
00059                        FIFORESET=0x00; SYNCDELAY();}
00060 
00063 #define RESETFIFOS() {FIFORESET=0x80; SYNCDELAY();\
00064                      FIFORESET=0x02; SYNCDELAY();\
00065                      FIFORESET=0x04; SYNCDELAY();\
00066                      FIFORESET=0x06; SYNCDELAY();\
00067                      FIFORESET=0x08; SYNCDELAY();\
00068                      FIFORESET=0x00; SYNCDELAY();}
